task:task.name: createReport
task:task.description: Task for creating a report from a set of alignment results files.

output.name: mismatchingAlignments
output.description: A file to write alignments whose mismatches increase the error rate.

arg.name: referenceGenomeMappingFile
arg.description: File containing mappings between reference genome IDs (bowtie prefixes) and species names/synonyms.

arg.name: xslStyleSheetFile
arg.description: XSL stylesheet file to be copied to the output directory.

arg.name: outputFilePrefix
arg.description: File name prefix for output report, image and XML files.

arg.name: separateDatasetReports
arg.description: To create individual reports for each dataset.

arg.name: datasetReportFilePrefix
arg.description: File name prefix for creating separate report for each dataset.

arg.name: trimStart
arg.description: The position within sequences from which to start trimming for alignment; any bases before this position will be trimmed.

arg.name: trimLength
arg.description: The length to trim sequences to for alignment.

arg.name: plotWidth
arg.description: The width of the plot in pixels.

arg.name: minimumSequenceCount
arg.description: The minimum number of sequences to display on the x-axis.
